verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Awake, put on thy strength, Oh Zion.
Put on thy beautiful garments, Oh Jerusalem.
For henceforth shall no more come unto thee
The uncircumcised and unclean.
For the Lord hath redeemed thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Break forth into joy; sing together
Ye waste places of Jerusalem.
For the Lord hath comforted His people;
He hath redeemed Jerusalem.
